_header: Harken words wonder good / How Jesu Christ was done on Rood
Note:
Sometimes ascribed to Skelton, but in error; some stanzas incorporated into Towneley Play XXVI — see Taylor (1907)
XTaylor, G. C. “The English Corpus Christi Play and the Middle English Lyric.” Modern Philology 5 (1907-08): 1-38, 26-7.
Title(s): The Complaint of Christ on the Cross
Subjects: Christ, complaint of, to man; Passion, meditations on
_description: The Complaint of Christ on the Cross, a meditation — twenty three 7-line stanzas (aaabccb)
